+- [ ] Strings ressources: I checked that all strings added as ressources are new or I added comments to explain the difference between both ressources

replies.bodyText:
I am not asking for comment on all strings. It seems we are going to use screenshot and not explanations, which is not a bad idea at all. If we don't have explanation for current strings, it's strange to ask for future strings.
My point is only that I want to avoid duplicate strings. Sometime duplicate strings are necessary because two translations can be possible. In this case, and in this case only, I really want a comment to explain what is going on. That's going to be useful for translators of course, but also for futur dev. Indeed, if a dev' want to reuse the string at some point in time, they'll need to know what ressource to use. Currently, it's not easy to make a choice between different ressources with the same English string
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

replies.bodyText: @Arthur-Milchior glad I asked, I did not understand your intent. I updated my suggested text above, how does it fit now?
